verses.verse: מִזְמ֗וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor, [A] Psalm לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David יְ֭הֹוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD מִי־ <WH4310> mi- who יָג֣וּר <WH1481> ya-Gur who shall abide בְּאָהֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH168> be-'o-ho-Le-cha; tent מִֽי־ <WH4310> mi- who יִ֝שְׁכֹּ֗ן <WH7931> yish-Kon, may dwell בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> be-Har hill קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> kod-She-cha in thy holy

הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> ho-Lech He that walketh תָּ֭מִים <WH8549> Ta-mim uprightly וּפֹעֵ֥ל <WH6466> u-fo-'El and worketh צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek; righteousness וְדֹבֵ֥ר <WH1696> ve-do-Ver and speaketh אֱ֝מֶ֗ת <WH571> 'e-Met, the truth בִּלְבָבֽוֹ׃ <WH3824> bil-va-Vo. in his heart

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor רָגַ֨ל׀ <WH7270> ra-Gal [He that] backbiteth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against לְשֹׁנ֗וֹ <WH3956> le-sho-No, not with his tongue לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah nor doeth לְרֵעֵ֣הוּ <WH7453> le-re-'E-hu to his neighbour רָעָ֑ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah; evil וְ֝חֶרְפָּ֗ה <WH2781> ve-cher-Pah, a reproach לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor נָשָׂ֥א <WH5375> na-Sa nor taketh up עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against קְרֹֽבוֹ׃ <WH7138> ke-Roov. against his neighbour

נִבְזֶ֤ה׀ <WH959> niv-Zeh is contemned בְּֽעֵ֘ינָ֤יו <WH5869> be-'Ei-Nav In whose eyes נִמְאָ֗ס <WH3988> nim-'As, a vile person וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> yir-'Ei them that fear יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD יְכַבֵּ֑ד <WH3513> ye-chab-Bed; but he honoureth נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> nish-Ba' [He that] sweareth לְ֝הָרַ֗ע <WH7489> le-ha-Ra', to [his own] hurt וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and does not יָמִֽר׃ <WH4171> ya-Mir. and changeth

כַּסְפּ֤וֹ׀ <WH3701> kas-Po his money לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> na-Tan [He that] putteth not out בְּנֶשֶׁךְ֮ <WH5392> be-ne-sheCh to usury וְשֹׁ֥חַד <WH7810> ve-Sho-chad reward עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against נָקִ֗י <WH5355> na-Ki, against the innocent לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo Nor לָ֫קָ֥ח <WH3947> la-Kach nor taketh עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> 'o-seh- He that doeth אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh; these לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo Nor יִמּ֣וֹט <WH4131> yim-Mot be moved לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> le-'o-Lam. these [things] shall never
